passages.text:
Ah, you again! Well, the festival is tomorrow. Now, I am a faithful man, so on the day of the festival, I don't like to partake in business affairs.
[[continue]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
But sometime during the next day, I would like to discuss the many options I have available for a more permanent housing solution for you. Come to my house and we can have a little chat, alright?
[[Alright...|alright]]
[[I'm not staying here.|not staying]]
passages.name: continue

passages.text:
Ah, see, I knew you would stay! They always do. And if you're already feeling this way, I can't even imagine how excited you'll be to join our community after you see what the festival has in store for you!
[[Bye]]
passages.name: alright

passages.text:
No...? My, that is rather odd... and rather unexpected. Are you sure?
[[Yes.|yes sure]]
[[Why would I be staying?|why stay]]

links.name: Why would I be staying?|why stay
links.link: Why would I be staying?|why stay

passages.name: not staying

passages.text:
Hmm... Well, do let me know if you change your mind. I have a feeling you will after you see what the festival has in store for you. They always do...
[[Bye]]
passages.name: yes sure

passages.text:
Why, everyone stays! Especially after the festival. I don't see why you wouldn't!
[[Bye]]
passages.name: why stay

passages.text: I'll be on my way now, lots to do. Find me after the festival and we'll talk!
passages.name: Bye
